text: Lad from Our Town () is a 1942Броня на пленке. 10 отечественных фильмов о танках Soviet drama movie directed by Boris Ivanov, Aleksandr Stolper and Aleksandr Ptushko.ПАРЕНЬ ИЗ НАШЕГО ГОРОДА It stars Nikolai Kryuchkov, Nikolay Bogolyubov, and Lidiya Smirnova. == Actors == * Nikolai Kryuchkov as Sergei Lukonin * Nikolay Bogolyubov as Dr. Arkady Andreyevich Burmin * Lidiya Smirnova as Varya Lukonina-Burmina * Vladimir Kandelaki as Vano Guliashvili * Nikolay Mordvinov as Aleksei Petrovich Vasnetsov * Nina Zorskaya as Zhenya Burmin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1942 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Stolper Category:Movies directed by Boris Ivanov
title: Lad from Our Town
